column5: "I Can Do It"  painting just finished.  An OFNer's son trying to put the worm on the hook.    Pam
One of your best yet, Pam!!  Well Done!
thats phenominal

Well done Pamela.  Some OFNCers have unbelievable talents (aside from the general angling abilities we share) and you're right up there with the cream of the crop. I can only dream about being able to produce that kind of art.
That is a great pic Pam!!!! I really like the lines in tht one!
that painting is awesome, I love that painting, flash back.
They keep getting better with each painting Pam. Incredible.
very nice!
You just keep getting better!
Very nice Pam, it captures the innocence.  Great job.  Joey

Very nice painting Pamela.  Here is a painting my wife painted six months ago of a picture of my eldest daughter who is now 12 .  She was about 4 yrs old when the shot was taken on the beach of Lake Nippissing In Northbay.  I wish she had the time to paint as often as you.    MTP
Very talented painters indeed.  Remarkable realism.
That one is very nice Pam but I still prefer this one...
simply amazing Pam.... cliff..
Speechless. Very nice.
Excellent as always Pam, thanks for sharing.  Maureen
Excellent painting.  You have an amazing talent     It captures the moment perfectly.  Thanks for sharing and i look forward to seeing more in the future.  FOTB
Your wife is very talented.      It's unfortunate she doesnt have more time to paint.  Thanks for sharing.  FOTB
Truly amazing work all around! Sure captures a great moment!  Easton

Thank all of you for your kind comments.   I just like sharing what I've been up to.  Most of my friends are on-line and I only have my sister here in Timmins to see my artwork.  Now, to the next project.  Pam
beautiful paintings!
That is fantastic work!  Absolutely brilliant!  You have a gift...
Very nice Pam!
